website_summaries.verdict: The top pick for young children who want to learn basic percussive rhythms and styles.
pros: Made with a higher level of durability for use with children
Drums use heavy-duty heads to survive repeated abuse and play
Easy to learn for most children
cons: Lack the volume and resonance of regular bongos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing drums for over 25 years. I have plenty of professional drums lying around the house. I consider them all good instruments, but they are too big and too fragile for my kids. I got them this for Christmas. Great sounds, good quality, and very durable. They are quieter than my professional grade bongos and they sound fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brooks

customer_reviews.title: It’s surprisingly sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it six months ago for my home daycare. Initially I was little concerned about how durable it is with heavy use in a daily basis. All I can say is six months later, it’s still like new! My kids beat, sit on the top and sit inside, put toys in it, push it all over the room with upside down...... they are just so creative :)) The sound— it’s a real drum, as other reviewers mentioned, it’s not a cheap drum like toy. The sound is amazing. Both myself and my kids love playing it! They play literally everyday! I paid full price for the product. You won’t regret.
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, parents play with it too. Sturdy, quality toy
customer_reviews.text: 8 month old can't get enough. This drum encouraged him to sit up and crawl. First spotted it in a classroom. 9 year old enjoys it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mbc family

customer_reviews.title: Extremely small toddler size
customer_reviews.text: very small bongo's. They make the same sound on each drum. When it says kids, it means kids who just want to bang on something that has no musical value. Very disappointed. We waited well over a month to let our Daughter open them. We had no idea they were this bad and we were well over the return period. She lost interest after 5 minutes. Now they need to go to Goodwill because they are worthless. Save your money and buy a real set of Bongos. These are a DUD!
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: The good and bad
customer_reviews.text: This drum is so loud when the kids really get excited using it. So I wouldn't suggest it for a small space. This thing will likely last for eternity. Don't get this thinking it will break and be done quickly. Our three year old will sit on it and use it as a step stool almost daily. He uses all sorts of dots as sticks. And yet it has held up. Great lasting toy that is great outdoors
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drum for children
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and sound! I bought this for my son around his first birthday. It has held up to my son sitting in it, sitting on it, standing on it, hitting it with the stick, hitting with his hand, hitting it with blocks, wearing it as a hat, stacking blocks on it and more! I would gladly buy this again for any child or adult.
customer_reviews.author: Lightning M.

customer_reviews.title: Whoops...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it's a kid's drum. I should have expected it to sound like an empty oatmeal container. It's really good quality, and would be a great gift for a toddler. As for a spontaneous, late night, "duuuude... It would be so cool to have a conga drum... Woooaaahhh" purchase as an adult, for adult use, it was dumb. And obviously dumb, so there's that. But yeah, it has no depth or awesomeness in it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Our drum just arrived today and definitely has a sharp ...
customer_reviews.text: Our drum just arrived today and definitely has a sharp edge next to the staples securing the material at the rim. Is his normal? And/or can this be fixed? Please help.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Still works like new
customer_reviews.text: We wanted some simple bongos for our first child to go along with some other instruments that we had. We bought these, and now they are still being used by both our first child, and now our second. They have endured being drummed on by all kinds of things, stood on, tossed and a multitude of things that could have ruined it if it was cheaper. Due to how durable it is alone, it is a good buy. The only thing I wish is that one of them had a deeper sound because they sound fairly similar to me, but that is just me being picky.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not much tone
customer_reviews.text: Probably because of size and materials it's just not possible to get much tone from these...bought them for my granddaughter..but was so disappointed...we get better sound from a shoe box... But they are solid and very cute.
customer_reviews.author: kayteebee

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome decoration on the drums and a really rugged design. My son loves playing these, and his little hands can't yet make them loud enough to be bothersome. The rubber on the bottom makes them stay in place while he plays them and put my mind at ease a bit if/when they're dropped. I also like to play them... It takes me back to the days of playing in the percussion section of the school band!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Matichuk

customer_reviews.title: Flat sound
customer_reviews.text: I get that it's for kids but it sounds flat as heck. For the price...you can get an actual djembe that sounds like a drum not a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Quality purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great drums! The bongos aren’t too heavy for my 2 year old, and the sound is top notch. I was skeptical at first, but they do sound and feel nice. These aren’t as loud as adult size bongos when she’s playing, but I can get a louder sound with my hand. We keep the bongos in the family room. This encourages her to play along with other music or create music through out her busy day. Quality purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Deme

customer_reviews.title: Must have toy for kids!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 6 mo old after she loved using it at her daycare. Still a hit 5 mos later. Even though it says 3 yr and up, we find no issue giving to a younger baby under supervision. Really great quality, not some electronic noise that you will go crazy hearing for days on end. Our friends have purchased for their kids after playing with our daughters. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K10Badger

customer_reviews.title: Ecstatic toddlers on christmas!
customer_reviews.text: This drum was the 'big' christmas present that we got our daughters age 3, and 15 months, along with the remo bongos and the santagada young musician toolkit. OMG, the kids were in love at first boom! It was an amazing gift for around 20 bucks. They loved it even more than the Lets Rock Elmo from grandma! This drum is bigger than expected and beautiful, nice sound, only wish it came with 2 sticks! Has held up to their most furious banging and the baby climbing on top of it! this should provide years of entertainment, even the adults couldn't resist playing!
customer_reviews.author: Barbpatch

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend these
customer_reviews.text: We have one of the other drums and love it, and first discovered this brand at Gym bored Play & Learn music classes, so I thought some hand drums would be great. I was wrong. These are really hard to make much sound with, even for an adult. I have returned them and wouldn't recommend them. Get one of the large ones instead!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Bilodeau (Musings of Madjy)

customer_reviews.title: Authentic deep drum sound
customer_reviews.text: 2 yr old granddaughter loves this drum. The sound is deep and loud but not offensive like the tin pitch of toy piano keys. She has gotten a really good rhythm with the lollipop drumsticks we got her too. Dad often hand plays and gets into it. She got some crayon scribbles on it when dad was watching and I was so upset but some gentle soap & water removed it good as new. Love this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Good fun lil drum
customer_reviews.text: They stand on it, play them with chopsticks and mallets... I'm impressed they're still working! They're fun alone or in full jam mode! Disclaimer: This set was damaged in transport on the wall of one drum and I was discounted for it. Tops were and are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Gaetano Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect First Bongos for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these Bongos for my 1 year old grandson. He is drawn to them and loves slapping his hands on the bongo heads. The more he beats on them, the more he likes it. I am a drummer so I am hoping these get him into music :-) They are well built and sound terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Terrific sound and great toy even for our 14month old
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how versatile and fun this was for a toddler. When he wasn't beating it he was putting things into the drum. It's quiet stunning in design and the sound is so much better than the plastic drums (it's still toy quality-but I liked the sound). My grandson laughed when he played it and kept coming back to it.
customer_reviews.author: Meerkatsrock

customer_reviews.title: Great start
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son for 1st birthday... he loves it! We’ve had it for almost a year now and it sounds just as sharp as it did when he first slapped it. Light enough for him to lug around (acoustics are important) and adjustable volume (I can place a towel inside to muffle) this drum is awesome for beginners of all disciplines!
customer_reviews.author: Spearman

customer_reviews.title: this one has been one of the most consistently played with and enjoyed. I know we bought it a little young ...
customer_reviews.text: Of all the toys we've bought our little girl so far, this one has been one of the most consistently played with and enjoyed. I know we bought it a little young - she was only 9 months - but she was already drumming on everything. She loves drumming on this and is even pretty good with the stick. I've got my eye on other Remo products now, but this little guy is cute, extremely durable, and a blast for littles to make noise and rhythm with!
customer_reviews.author: RwQ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drum that holds up against a wild toddler
customer_reviews.text: The music classes and daycare that I take my child to use this brand of drum, so I bought one for home since I figured it would hold up to a lot of use. It has not disappointed! Good sound and very sturdy, my toddler bangs her blocks on it and flips the drum over and no damage has been done.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Philpotts

customer_reviews.title: this mom bought her own kid a noisy toy!!
customer_reviews.text: what the #@!%$$# was i thinking buying this bongo for my kid? i did that. all on my own. (bright idea right??!) she however loves it and can even keep a beat and its super cool. it seems pretty quality made and has a shoulder strap. just the right size for my 4 year old. the top feels think like the real drum tops and the whole outside is decorated in its a small world? little tiny different people. you should probably buy it. Update. It's now 4 years and two kids later and they still play with this!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Co

customer_reviews.title: cool multicultural design
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 month old loves playing and smacking these drums! PROs: Inexpensive, cool multicultural design, good sound!! CON: There is some piping around the edges that a small child may eat and/or pull off/play with. Use caution and your own judgment when letting your child(ren) play with this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Riah

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Have not had it for long so can’t speak to it’s longevity but my daughter took to it immediately right out of the box! It has a great sound and the print is beautiful and diverse! I think she will enjoy this for years!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Rios

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this drum for my son who was 14 months at the time and is now pushing 2 years old. He has enjoyed the drum tremendously this whole time and it has held up just as I would expect from a product made by Remo. The only neg on this item is that it only comes with one drumstick but a couple bucks and free Prime shipping later, and we had that problem handled.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W

customer_reviews.title: OMG - our 2 year old grandson loved this. We gave it to him on Saturday ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG - our 2 year old grandson loved this. We gave it to him on Saturday and thank goodness the family left on Sunday, because both days he was non-stop playing them. That's the upside of grand-parenting - get to send them home with the noisy gifts! We did make him drum sticks. We bought the bongos initially thinking it was safer than drums, won't poke your eye out etc. but first thing he wanted were sticks. He watches drummers on TV. This was definitely a good gift and after hours of use, they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for real music
customer_reviews.text: Rather disappointing. These are TINY. I’m a music teacher and have had kids play on quality drums...these are much more toy-like. Sure, they are something to bang on, but kids won’t get practice learning how to move their hands to create different sounds- there’s only enough space on the drumhead to hit in ONE spot. They don’t sound good unless you’re holding them in the air, which is difficult for kids to do. Returning and purchasing a bigger set.
customer_reviews.author: Tami J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This was part of a box of instruments we gave our four year old granddaughters for Christmas. They loved it. I don't know much about drums, but makes a really good sound, appears to be well made, and the design around the sides is great. Very happy. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: MRodz

customer_reviews.title: Start your child with these
customer_reviews.text: Got theses Remo bongos for my toddler. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of sound from them. The bottoms has a hard rubber flange/stand thing so that whatever these are setting on don't get damaged. The connector between the drums is held with simple wingnuts that if were torqued to much, i fear would damage the drums. Therefore, these may be easy to undo by a curious child. So far, it's not been a problem for me. The print on the drums is delightful, and is very colorful. The picture's colors are a bit different. Whatever looks blue in the pic is black with the product i received.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it if u r trying to use them as drum
customer_reviews.text: These drums do not make any kind of drum sound - may as well tap hands on a table or something. Also did not include the stick- returning
customer_reviews.author: rozamy

customer_reviews.title: High quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: I am now a huge fan of Remo drums. They are high quality and have a great sound. Perfect for my toddler who loves to drum but I could see someone of any age enjoying these. I sure do!
customer_reviews.author: StarSculptress

customer_reviews.title: A very solid and well constructed toy.
customer_reviews.text: The stand out feature of this tambourine is that it is very well constructed. It also sounds great, if you like the sound of tambourines. One important consideration regarding this toy being so well made, is that you will potentially be listening to a kid banging a tambourine for a very, very long time. You decide for yourself if that's a good thing. It may last long enough to use for panhandling at the airport if the economy tanks when your child reached employment age.
customer_reviews.author: DWM

customer_reviews.title: Not Much Sound
customer_reviews.text: Does not have much of a sound. My grandson likes to pound on things like boxes, the table, etc, so I thought he would love these bongos. He did not, because they made less of a sound than pounding on a box.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my grand nephew
customer_reviews.text: My one and one half year old grand nephew love these drums. They are very durable, and I hope that they will last for many years to come......I'm pretty sure they will.
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids... and annoying my brother, their father. Hehehe
customer_reviews.text: I am a lifelong musician, so I naturally feel compelled to give my nieces and nephews musical instruments and encourage them in arts. Their parents are the sports focused type of parents, not that there is anything wrong with that. My niece shows a lot of rhythmic talent. At 3 yo she is banging away at some of my old snare pads with a well timed, repeating pattern. It's amazing to watch. So, I go her these bongos for Xmas. She loves playing them and is good at it. The drums are well made. Cannot tune the heads, but I don't think that matters for a child. And, they annoy the parents perfectly. Win/Win. Merry Xmas! Hehehehe.
customer_reviews.author: PGM

customer_reviews.title: Fun, sturdy drum
customer_reviews.text: Fun, sturdy drum to add to a music class, or for fun. I bought these to add to my percussion collection for my kids classes. The sound is ok, nothing spectacular, but the students really enjoy playing with them. Bought them 6 months ago, travel with them constantly, many, many hands have played them, and they're still just like new. The one downside is that I find I am constantly tightening the screws that hold them together. It's not a huge deal, just wish the'd stay together on their own. Other than that, the're great!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn CM

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy good sounding drum
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy good sounding drum. Our toddler has been giving it a beating for 4 months now and it's still in great shape. Could do without the plastic drum stick, but I picked up a pair of real drum sticks at a thrift store and he can make some real noise with them! Also sounds great as a hand drum. Our musical little dude is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: R Silvert

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bongos!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bongos. A little disappointed in their sound. Could just be me, I am not musically inclined. Bought for my 26 month old grandson who loves to bang on things. Have to say when his Dad used them, they sounded very good.
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My son lovesssss this tambourine- he is 7 months and loves banging it ! It is very durable for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Chanise Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Why are there two bolts that can cut my kid?
customer_reviews.text: There are two bolts joining the two drums, that are easily accessible by flipping over the drums. My kid constantly wants to flip the drums over and reach in. They're sharp enough bolts to cut a kid easily. Why didn't they at least cap these? The drums otherwise sound fine and my kid likes them. It's just troublesome because you have to be constantly vigilant to avoid your child's injury.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Little ones love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my music classes. The little ones LOVE the remo drums. If they could, they'd keeping playing with them all day! Very sturdy, great sound, and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These bongos are so cute!!!! Not only are they adorable they are really well made. They look and feel like the real deal ones my dad used to have. My son absolutely loves these. Everytime we play music he goes to his bongos.
customer_reviews.author: ViviD

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Cute and perfect along with the other bongos we have. Toddler loves them and we bought jazz brushes and jazz rakes to use with them as well. We have had these a little while now and the heads are super durable, sound good and are holding up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and super fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My son who is 1 loves these things highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Samantha A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Its doesnt sound as nice as the "Remo Kids Percussion Floor Tom Drum - ...
customer_reviews.text: Its doesnt sound as nice as the "Remo Kids Percussion Floor Tom Drum - Fabric Rain Forest, 10" but its a nice addition to the tom drum. But if i was getting my son just one drum i would buy the tom drum instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Reviews seems to be good on average
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to get my son a starting kit of bongos so that he could experiment the effects of percussion and drums. I thought that going with the Remo brand would guarantee this. Reviews seems to be good on average, so I said why not. However, the acoustics of this set is horrible. It sounds hollow, just like hitting a table with your hand. Very poor purchase, specially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: No sticks
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews and they stated that the stick that came with it made it sound better. BEWARE! No stick is included and the bongos do not sound good just beat on with little hands. Now I have to purchase the stick.
customer_reviews.author: bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 1yr old's birthday because he loves banging on pots and pans like a drum. I haven't given it to him yet but, they sound great! Really authentic and playful. They are built pretty sturdy and didn't have any issues during shipping. All the other kid bongo sets I found were too small, had empty bottoms, or didn't produce an authentic fun sound that I know kids enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: AmeyaU

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and a great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I got these bongos for my 1 yr old. She loves banging on it. And after all the banging they're in great shape. I even caught her standing on them and they're still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. My boy loves playing with them. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sanzida

customer_reviews.title: Good sound!
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for a drum for my toddler that actually sounded like a drum and finally found one! These are so much fun! They do not come with mallets but just as fun to drum with your hands.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Much nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: I can't add much to the review from the professional drummer - but we bought these for our autistic 6 year old based on his review, and I have to agree with everything he said. They are surprisingly well made, very sturdy, and actually sound nice (to me). As already noted - check the wingnuts inside for looseness when you first get it.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT SOUND! My kid loves pounding on this. It is insanely loud so if u get annoyed by drumming and live in a small place u may want a different drum. It’s one of the best overall quality and craftsmanship in any toy I’ve ever seen. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Badmom

customer_reviews.title: We love these drums
customer_reviews.text: We love these drums. I have two kids, so before I wrapped it up for Christmas, I unscrewed the wingnuts holding the drums together. Now we have two drums. They can each have one to play, or one kid can play both while another plays some other instrument. I also like how they nest inside of each other for storage, now that we have taken them apart.
customer_reviews.author: T. Price

customer_reviews.title: Well made with a good sound
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for young children to join in the band. It is easy to grasp without small pieces or rough edges, and has a great sound when shaken or drummed against.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these things and we’re coming up on two years with them, good toy and tough as nails to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Barrett Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Smashing!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this for my friend's 2-year-old kid, along with the larger floor tom with mallet.. was doubtful if this was even going to be liked or used at all, but turns out the kid recognized them, "knows what bongos are from cartoons".. he was super excited before these came out of the box, totally knew what to do with them, it was a total score. So was the floor tom, by the way.. we were jamming for hours. These look super cool, seem very sturdily and safely built for kids, annnnd.. they have Remo heads! They sound totally great, not cheap. A pro toy.
customer_reviews.author: David Chants

customer_reviews.title: What I can say is that we got these for my 8 month old daughter because she loved banging on anything and everything
customer_reviews.text: I can't claim to know much about bongos, how they should sound, etc. What I can say is that we got these for my 8 month old daughter because she loved banging on anything and everything, but didn't want to spend a ton. She loves them and they have been a favorite for 5 months now! They are light enough that she can carry them and even though she had a habit at the start of pushing them skin side down, they are still in good condition!
customer_reviews.author: Robin K

customer_reviews.title: Not a toy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 3 year old Granddaughter. We put it away for the future. There is a sharp screw and wing nut that holds the bongos together on the inside. The bongos lack tone and volume. Who knows, maybe they will be used later!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves playing them! Got good sound better than any toy bongo! Seems well built so should last. Had to tape screw on bottom since he likes to,check out where the,sound comes from.
customer_reviews.author: LTandMR

customer_reviews.title: it doesnt have a nice sound at all
customer_reviews.text: it doesnt have a nice sound at all. I ended up purchasing the floor drum with ballots and I love it! the sound is great! I purchased it for my 9 month old son and its his favorite toy right now!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I half expected it to be cheaply made like others I had received before but was excited to ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 3 yr old grandson who loves to drum. I half expected it to be cheaply made like others I had received before but was excited to see it is a well made, colorful, perfect size drum! Good sound, made well enough to be handled roughly, dropped or beat on by a small, happy boy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, fun, beautiful drums
customer_reviews.text: We debated buying 'real' bongos for a while, but decided that we couldn't go wrong with $20 Remo bongos for our 15 month old daughter. I'm so glad we didn't overspend, because these are perfect! They have some of these at her daycare, and they are easy for babies to use, solid but not dangerously heavy, and make a satisfyingly loud sound. These are very high quality, solid, and beautiful. They work well and make a great drummy sound. They are pretty large, too, relative to children themselves. Overall, a great and reasonable purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Q

customer_reviews.title: Def a buy
customer_reviews.text: Buy your baby a drum, just not a drum set! Baby loves banging on this drum with both Momma and Papa. Its quality enough that you can actually produce distinct tones with it, so it's a real instrument, not a toy.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Seney

customer_reviews.title: They're of such good quality too
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 month old. She loves them! They came well packaged and arrived quickly. They're of such good quality too! We all know how rough toddlers are on things, and so far, these have withstood the test. I'm eager to order more of these products.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Reiter

customer_reviews.title: item is totally not meant for children
customer_reviews.text: This item was used by our music teacher and it tore in his hands, a professional in one month. Do not order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best gift for a great kit
customer_reviews.text: my wife and i bought this drum for a baby's first birthday since she liked to drum on things. we wanted to get her a real instrument and not some crappy toy drum. we went with remo since it's an actual drum head company. well remo sure delivered! the tone on this thing is awesome enough that i wanted to keep it. but i didn't. when the recipient of the gift opened it, she immediately started jammin! then she found the included stick and kicked it up a notch. max roach in the house!!
customer_reviews.author: david hazardous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my pediatric patients with bilateral upper extremity and rhythmical reciprocal motion goals, and have not been disappointed! The sounds quality is very good for the price and the kids LOVE it. Only comes with the one dual-sided drumstick pictured so buying a couple of drumsticks or making two with dowels and fabric scraps is essential for making this functional for bilateral drumming, but this has been a good investment in terms of quality and variety of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Xpblcta

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner drum
customer_reviews.text: Loved the price Only on stick Non-Replaceable head to save cost
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey g. hilbert

customer_reviews.title: Not only do these drums have great sound for a kids' bongo set
customer_reviews.text: Not only do these drums have great sound for a kids' bongo set, they are well made and I love that the design on them features people of color. My three-year-old plays with them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Fitzwater-Stevens

customer_reviews.title: This is a toy
customer_reviews.text: This is really a kids toy and not much of a drum. Extremely difficult to get a decent sound from it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kantor

customer_reviews.title: One mallet
customer_reviews.text: Drum looks great and like a real drum. Description says it comes with a pair of mallets. Only has one. My only reason for a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Kim O

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My toddler likes it. Especially the art. The top feels like plastic. Hope it doesn’t rip anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound & Colorful!
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound and the fact that the drums are sturdy and colorful. My kids love to play them. I may buy a second one .
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 yr old's birthday and I was not disappointed. The head on it is durable enough that he stands on it often (not that we let him do that) but he's learned that it holds his weight. The sound is a deep tom sound which he also likes. I wish it would have come with 2 sticks instead of just the 1, that would be my only complaint. The feet on the bottom help with the sound where others would not have the same tone because they sat on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Grapes

customer_reviews.title: Bongos
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s real sturdy and looks good my daughter loves playing it
customer_reviews.author: april ballard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality at great price. Got it for my one year old and we both love playing them! I look forward to watching him play them for years!
customer_reviews.author: rvs357

customer_reviews.title: Coolest bongos for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great bongos! What a great gift for toddlers! My boy is 15 months old and LOVES them! Quality and size are PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Rhythm Club products are very nice and well priced.
customer_reviews.text: The drums we bought are well made and have a good sound. Our little girl loves them and we all have a good time with our little band.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn G.

customer_reviews.title: The grandkids take turns but they certainly love this drum
customer_reviews.text: I realized I couldn't have just one drum. We need more at our house. The grandkids take turns but they certainly love this drum. Very good quaility sound.
customer_reviews.author: evevogt

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for kids 2+
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yo daughter and I took a music class together, (singing and dancing, good times), and the instructor had these in all shapes and sizes. They are really tough and have wonderful pictures on them. Plus the sound is the real deal! Big booming! The kids love to pound on them and dance! So cute, and healthy. I do recommend supervising them while they play with it because the wand can be used as a weapon and the drum could be thrown across the room and it may not handle that well. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Goblin

customer_reviews.title: Great drum for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is my 8 month old’s favorite toy. It’s the perfect size, sturdy, the sound is very satisfying which encourages him to play. We also used these drums in the classroom when I was a teacher. Recommended for children for supervised play!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Bam bam
customer_reviews.text: Great for babies who like to bang on everything. Fun for mom & dad too.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Drums
customer_reviews.text: Great hit for nephew’s birthday 1 he was making quite a racket (sorry, playing his music) along with his favorite - Dispatch! Good quality and tons of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sara M. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Have had it a little more then a yr and still going strong , made very well and stays strong even after a two yr old constantly hitting it !
customer_reviews.author: Kammi p.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: These bongos hold up great! We bought them for a christmas gift for our 18 month old. I also have an in home daycare. They have taken their fair share of beatings with hands, sticks, and other miscellaneous toys. The kids also love to stand on them (even though they know they're not supposed to). Would buy them again! All my kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Craver

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful drum and durable
customer_reviews.text: The best drum for a child ever! My nephew's son is all boy rough and tough and this drum is still standing. He plays with it all the time. He's broken other drums his parents gave him but my wonderful purchase is still going strong! Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Strain

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Good quality. Bought for a toddler. Not too loud or obnoxious at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jelly

customer_reviews.title: These were ok.
customer_reviews.text: They don't have much of a sound when a 5 yr old plays them . Both of the kids prefered the 10" tom tom with mallet better. But it has now been placed in the room as part of the band. Everything about them was ok, just not special.
customer_reviews.author: Fundmntl

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument- durable and good quality and kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for all ages. both toy and instrument. will last a long time. I love their products we have a drum that has survived a wild older brother from this company and this goes along great with it. Can drum on it or hit with hand. Its like 2 instruments in 1! I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: This "toy" sounds and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I play all kinds of instruments so to teach my kids I started them with something rhythm based. This "toy" really is more an instrument than anything and given the price I paid its a great deal. Remo makes these great intro "toys" that really are more instruments and sound great. They are also durable like a "toy" would be but sound like the real deal. Boys or girls can play with this, heck even adults. I find myself picking these up and tapping away just because its fun.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Amazing good quality drum
customer_reviews.text: Amazing good quality drum. My son actually stood on it and it didn't break. Would love some more modern prints too but this makes a great quality sound, is sturdy, and it just works! Don't buy the ones that break after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old granddaughter loves it. It is durable and sounds like a drum!
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Great drum for our kid. Sounds fantastic. I wish it came with two sticks, though. We can’t find a 2nd stick to match the one that came with it, either. Perhaps they’re out there somewhere. We’ll likely end up purchasing a pair of matching sticks, but we like the lightweight one that came with it... just wish there were two.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Babalu!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler likes watching Desi Arnaz videos and the second he saw this on Christmas he was thrilled, put it on and started on Babalu. It makes a really good sound, and is a good size for maybe three years old and up to wear. I've bought other remo drums and this one is just as nicely made and fun to play. Plus it's not a cheap 'kids' instrument and feels like it will hold up for a long time
customer_reviews.author: drmrsthemonarch

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson, and it just arrived. The top is not suede as described, and there is only one drumstick, not two as described. I am disappointed, but there's no time to order anything else. I hope it's sturdier than it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Spiegel

customer_reviews.title: every kids love it! It comes with pretty big smell
customer_reviews.text: Saw this at my son's gymboree class, every kids love it! It comes with pretty big smell, not sure will it gone, otherwise, 5stars. Kids can use it as little chair too, it's very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know why the reviews are so good for this item
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why the reviews are so good for this item. They don’t sound like drums, like my pots and pans sound more like drums than these fake ones do.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

product_meta.title: Remo RH-5600-00 Rhythm Club Bongo Drum - Rhythm Kids, 5"-6"
product_meta.description: Style:Bongo DrumRemo Rhythm Club bongos are a fun, affordable way to add the unique flavor of bongos to your drum circle, classroom or other musical experience.
feature_bullets: Synthetic head does not fluctuate in pitch With temperature and humidity changes
Remo percussion instruments have an excellent reputation for holding up in an institutional or heavy use environment
Package Dimensions: 13.716 L x 31.242 H x 16.002 W (centimeters)
